code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl);};var create=function create(newObject){return axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);};var update=function update(id,newObject){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);};var remove=function remove(id){axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return getAll();};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,remove:remove};
